version_description: + Optical zoom for iPhone 5 and higher (use pinch-to-zoom gesture)

+ NEW: Magnetic meter, an additional tool, to help detect hidden electronics including spy cams
+ Option for 3 auto detectors

+ Improved automatic mode
+ Permissions for saving of snapshots

+ Automatic mode has been greatly improved but as always manual confirmation is still needed
+ Room lighting and unsteady phone message

+ improved false positive filtering from shiny surfaces
+ scanning continues even when there's an advisory
+ flashing is paused during magnetic detection
+ smoother pinch-to-zoom

Thank you all for this milestone Version X. Still the most advanced camera detector app:
+ bonus 1: scanner for some bluetooth-enabled home cameras
+ bonus 2: magnetic scanner (some "detector" apps are based solely on this feature)
+ tweaks to automatic detection
+ "move or zoom" advisory when auto-detected is low quality
+ compatibility with latest iPhone X screens
+ Enhanced EMF scanner with automatic detection. Hold the phone near the target device then after a couple of seconds tap the target device for auto detection.
+ EMF scanner now adjusts sensitivity level as specified in the settings page
